title: [整地]Animal Spawn Limitator —— 限制动物生成,让动物蛋价格贬到最低！[1.7.x]
author: 西木凛
txt_content:
== Animal Spawn Limitator ==

With this plugin you can limit the amount of animals per chunck via a .txt file.  - 这个txt我找不到吧
This plugin does not kill animals if you have too much, it prvents them from spawning. 
If you try to get rid of all the animals you will have to kill them manually, 
but if you do not want new ones to spawn, this plugin is the right one for you.
 You can change the amount of allowed animals per chunck in the automaticly created text file.
This is one of my first plugins so if you have any suggestion let me know.
-mfunGamer



== 作用 ==

这个插件会限制用指令生成动物
刷怪蛋生成,以及繁殖等等情况
你打上这个插件就别想养畜生了
还是回去种菜生活吧！ ?





== 废话 ==
就是这么多~刷怪蛋是什么鬼~送给玩家又何妨对吧！

replies.author: a8105
replies.txt_content:
{:10_495:}杀一只少一只,到时候牛猪鸡成了频临灭绝的动物,然后熊孩子屠杀了最后一只
OP五花大绑熊孩子,挂到主城晒尸81天,终于卸载了这个插件
